descriptionHtml:
REQUIERED: DRAGONBORN DLC
<br />Edits: Lleril Morvayn (From Solstheim)
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />Changes to the following families depending on which side they took during the Civil War:
<br />- Gray-Mane's : Now have Fine Blue Clothes. (Stormcloaks)
<br />- Battle-Borns : Now have Fine Red Clothes. (Imperials)
<br />- Silver-Bloods : Now have Fine Blue CLothes (Stormcloaks)
<br />- Black-Briars : Now have Fine Red Clothes (Imperials)
<br />- Cruel Seas : Now have Fine Blue Clothes (Stormcloaks)
<br />- Shatter-Shields : Now have Fine Red Clothes (Imperials)
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />The following characters have changings:
<br />- Alexia Vicci : Fine Red Clothes
<br />- Muri : Fine Red Clothes
<br />- Dengeir : Fine Blue Clothes
<br />- Thadgeir : Fine Red Clothes
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />All stewards were changed to fine clothes that matched the side they were on.
<br />Example: Anuriel from Riften has Fine Red Clothes... But she is on the Stormcloak side so I changed her clothes to Fine Blue Clothes.
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />Bugs: None
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />Nexus Link: TBA
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />Future Updates: Making it compatible without DLC'sÂ
author: Byakugan
